data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cervantes, Gabriela, Fragoso, Carlos, Monteros, Alejandro Espinosa De Los, Sánchez-Ramos, Gerardo, Lara-Villalón, Manuel, Yañez-Pacheco, Manuel De Jesús, Lázaro-Castellanos, Jesús Omar, James, Samuel W. (2016): New species of the earthworm genus Zapatadrilus (Clitellata, Acanthodrilidae) from northern Mexico. Zootaxa 4189 (2): 311-326, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.2.7|4 occurrences
